roleset.name: start a fire again
roleset.note: REKINDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rekindle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4. (from rekindle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: rarely a literal fire
example.text: Last week, [a mediator]-2 failed [*-2]to rekindle talks between the company and the strikers, who have rejected a pay raise offer of 10% over three years.
example.arg: talks between the company and the strikers, who have rejected a pay raise offer of 10% over three years
